column1: The Pit Room////I was in town for a UFC event and my buddy told me we had to go here for lunch. He also said I had to try the tacos
column2: so I ordered the Tex Mex dinner. It had two tacos and two sides
column6: and potato salad. That pulled pork taco was the best I have ever had. It was moist
column8: and flavorful. It didn't need any sauce at all it was that good. The mac and cheese and potato salad were absolutely delicious and i even was able to taste some of their homemade chips. Those things were out of this world good
column9: salty and fantastic. If you are in Houston
column10: stop by here for some real good BBQ.
